cause.description:
Shouldn't any civilised society put its children first? Shouldn't every kid have an equal chance at a childhood and a future?
1. Childhood is an inalienable human right
2. Every child is unique and equal
3. Education, healthcare, livelihoods, recreation and freedom from exploitation and abuse should be guaranteed to all children
cause.mission: Ensure every child is guaranteed the rights to survival, development, protection and participation
cause.name: Child Rights
